com.camerontec.util.datamodel.message

Interface FieldAllocator

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Recyclable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractFieldAllocator, PooledFieldAllocator, UnpooledFieldAllocator

    public interface FieldAllocator
extends Recyclable
    Interface to be implemented by classes capable of providing FieldProxy and FieldGroupProxy objects.

    • Method Summary
